title: Robotic Guinea Pig
description: Made as a substitute for real guinea pigs in Animal Assisted Therapy. Targets refugees/people who have experienced significant trauma.

title: Smart Water Meter
description: Prototype for a device that would track water usage for households.

title: Virtual Reality Video Chat
description: Prototype for immersive video chat experiences (involving olfactory and haptic senses as well) designed for astronauts with long mission times.

title: Mixed Reality Space Transformation
description: Utilises AR technologies to bring digital structures into a real space, creating opportunities for community interaction while minimising construction cost of facilities.

title: Minecraft Plugins
description: Series of Minecraft Spigot plugins (Java). Developed OOP concepts.

title: Custom Browser
description: Attempt at creating a web browser. Multiple iterations with different technologies including WebView2, Electron, and eventually attempting to patch Chromium source code.

title: Robocup (Australia)
description: Proportional line follower.

title: Open World Video Game
description: Attempt at using procedural generation to create a Minecraft-like open world.

title: Quizlet Clone
description: Attempted flashcard platform with spaced repetition, user authentication and document saving.

title: Megaphone
description: Twitter clone with post saving and user authentication.

title: AI Generated Genshin Music
description: Uses a custom-trained version of Google's Magenta model to generate Genshin music.

title: Personal Site
description: This thing you're looking at right now :)

title: Amethyst Screenshot
description: Screenshot tool to make pretty screenshots.

title: FIRST Website Remake
description: Remake of firstinspires.org, to learn TailwindCSS

title: Minecraft Command Macro
description: Macro to enter a large amount of Minecraft commands.

title: SpeedWriter
description: Uses the HuggingFace Inference API with GPT-2 (or other models) to do next-token prediction. Eventually evolved into text generation.

title: isGPT
description: Detector to tell if a piece of text/a website has been made with ChatGPT or similar text-generation AI. Had greater accuracy then ZeroGPT in determining the origin of the US Constitution.

title: Potentiometer Instrument
description: Uses a potentiometer to alter pitch, because it's funny.

title: Rhythm Game
description: iOS app to measure the accuracy of a person's internal beatkeeping.

title: Buer
description: Text summary and OCR Discord bot.

title: Firetrace ðŸ”¥
description: Bushfire prediction that regular people can use. For Australia.

title: Project Cards
description: Generate pretty project cards for your project.

title: moovifier
description: Add movement to videos in real-time, to cut down on time spent in an editing program like After Effects.

title: leucas
description: Generate Beluga-like Discord conversations using webhooks.

title: unstrand
description: Chrome Extension to display the amount of time you've spent on a site - live.

title: algae-count
description: Quantitatively judge the amount of algal blooms in a given body of water.
